description.title: Stress - multiple concurrent subscribers, additional subscribing and unsubscribing
description.purpose:
A configurable number of subscribers are started to receive events from Obscuro, which stay subscribed for the duration of the test. Another configurable number of a bespoke client is started, where they continually subscribe and then unsubscribe repeatedly. Once running a set number of transactions are start and which are expected to be received by the continual subscribers i.e. the concurrent subscribes and unsubscribes should not cause any issues.
Skipped due to https://github.com/obscuronet/obscuro-internal/issues/1457
